action.item: CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputOptionSpatial(OutputOptionSpatialID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, ScenarioID INTEGER, RateOfSpread INTEGER, FireIntensity INTEGER, SpreadDirection INTEGER, SurfaceFuelConsumption INTEGER, CrownFractionBurned INTEGER, CrownFractionConsumed INTEGER, TotalFuelConsumption INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputRateOfSpreadMap(ScenarioID INTEGER, Iteration INTEGER, Timestep INTEGER, FireID INTEGER, FileName STRING, Band INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputFireIntensityMap(ScenarioID INTEGER, Iteration INTEGER, Timestep INTEGER, FireID INTEGER, FileName STRING, Band INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputSpreadDirectionMap(ScenarioID INTEGER, Iteration INTEGER, Timestep INTEGER, FireID INTEGER, FileName STRING, Band INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputSurfaceFuelConsumptionMap(ScenarioID INTEGER, Iteration INTEGER, Timestep INTEGER, FireID INTEGER, FileName STRING, Band INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputCrownFractionBurnedMap(ScenarioID INTEGER, Iteration INTEGER, Timestep INTEGER, FireID INTEGER, FileName STRING, Band INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputCrownFractionConsumedMap(ScenarioID INTEGER, Iteration INTEGER, Timestep INTEGER, FireID INTEGER, FileName STRING, Band INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3PlusPrometheus_OutputTotalFuelConsumptionMap(ScenarioID INTEGER, Iteration INTEGER, Timestep INTEGER, FireID INTEGER, FileName STRING, Band INTEGER)
